• Collaborate with data scientists, software engineers, and stakeholders to define project requirements, understand business challenges, and translate them into AI solutions.
• Utilize database, web application, and script programming technology to design & construct system solutions for decision support and factory process control, based on user requirements from customers This opening is for Early Career Experience within 3-5 Years of post-graduate working experience only.
• Candidates with experience in automation domain - particularly in Equipment Integration (EI) using SECS/GEM, Process Automation Control (PAC), or OpCenter is preferred.
• Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, C++, or JavaExperience with automation frameworks and tools, such as PAC & OpCenterExpertise in AI/ML frameworks and libraries (e.
• Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure, and tools like Docker and Kubernetes is highly valued.
